1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A father and son fishing trip is reeled in by excruciating back pain. A mom convinces her young construction worker son to get treatment for a boil under his arm. A grandmother forgets to take her medication and needs a jolt to slow her racing heart.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: A pragmatic man has two life threatening conditions: treating one could exacerbate the other. A captivating couple seek a solution to their engaging ring problem. An anxious woman fears the worst when her heart rate suddenly accelerates.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: A forklift operator faces possible amputation after a workplace injury. A young woman yawns with open-jawed results. An elderly man falls in his home and is examined for possible stroke in the hospital where his granddaughter works as a nurse.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: A diabetic man admits he may have waited too long to get treatment for his gangrenous foot. An 8 year-old's playground pranks meant a collision between his head and a pole. A fledgling business owner is frustrated by the length of time required to resolve her sharp stomach pains.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Weekend gardening leaves an older man short of breath. An elderly woman needs her ankle reset after an altercation with dogs. A truck driver injuries his fingers on the job and worries about providing for his family.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: A young mother is examined for injury as a result of a frightening accident. A soon-to-be-wed man sustains a cut a little too close for comfort. An elderly badminton player falls onto his hand during a match resulting in what he thinks is a sprain.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Doctors assist a patient with two life threatening conditions at the same time. A captivating couple seeks a solution to their ring problem. An anxious woman fears the worst when her heart rate suddenly accelerates.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: An arborist falled by a toppled tree fears a spinal injury. A stoic newlywed injuries her hand when running after children. A family looks for an explanation for their aged mother's ongoing fatigue.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: A woman with multiple sclerosis fears she's experiencing a stroke. A glassworker uses humour to cope with a serious injury. An elderly woman hopes there is a positive outcome to her husband's chest pains. A charge nurse talks about her love for caregiving.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: A truck driver experiencing numbness on one side of his body worries he won't be able to work if he's had a stroke. A feisty senior is keen to get to a barbeque but first wants to find out what's making him so dizzy. Nurse Kelly's mom brings her a gift. A fussy toddler with a persistent cough has her family on their toes.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: A frustrated woman recovering from a serious motorcycle accident fears infection has set in. A music teacher trips and suffers a potentially debilitating injury. A burly construction worker takes a tumble off a ladder onto his head. A produce stowaway sends a woman to emergency with an unusual complaint.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: A man stepped backwards off a loading dock and fell ten feet onto his head causing sizable blood loss. A post-casino stumble means a grandma has a larger foot than she'd been betting on. A baking accident leaves a teen with a sore hand. An exhausted chemotherapy patient coping with late stage cancer gets topped up.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Hospital staff are perplexed when multiple shocks fail to slow a patient's racing heart. A former alcoholic well known to hospital staff comes in with a shadow on his lung. A woman falls at her new job and cuts her hand. A cynical woman is certain she knows the source of her shoulder pain.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: An elderly woman experiences unusual confusion after a family dinner. A dizzy spell may mean stroke for a 77-year-old pickleball player. A husband is alarmed by his wife's unrelenting fatigue. A garbage truck driver learns a painful lesson after a momentary lapse of attention.

locations: Royal Columbian Hospital, New Westminster, British Columbia, Canada::(location)
Surrey Memorial Hospital, Surrey, British Columbia, Canada::(location)
Eagle Ridge Hospital, Port Moody, British Columbia, Canada::(location)
imdb.plot outline: Take a behind the scenes look at two of Canada's busiest Hospital Emergency Rooms in this reality style series. Follow along with the patients, their families, and hospital staff as they navigate through their journey in intimate interviews and real on the scene footage. Follow along with award winning musician and author, Jann Arden, as the interpersonal stories of the Emergency Room come together. Share in the joys and triumphs of these brave patients and hospital staff as they work together to obtain the best possible outcomes for all.
imdb.title: Emergency
plot: Take a behind the scenes look at two of Canada's busiest Hospital _Emergency_ (qv) Rooms in this reality style series. Follow along with the patients, their families, and hospital staff as they navigate through their journey in intimate interviews and real on the scene footage. Follow along with award winning musician and author, Jann Arden, as the interpersonal stories of the _Emergency_ (qv) Room come together. Share in the joys and triumphs of these brave patients and hospital staff as they work together to obtain the best possible outcomes for all.::Ian Scheil
